mapper.sql: DAMAGE_ID , SHOP_ID , MATERIEL_ID , DAMAGE_TIME , DESCRIPTION , IMG_FIRST_URL , IMG_SECOND_URL , IMG_THIRD_URL , REMARK , CREATE_BY , CREATE_TIME , UPDATE_BY , UPDATE_TIME , VERSION
SHOP_ID , MATERIEL_ID , DAMAGE_TIME , DESCRIPTION , IMG_FIRST_URL , IMG_SECOND_URL , IMG_THIRD_URL , REMARK , CREATE_BY , CREATE_TIME , UPDATE_BY , UPDATE_TIME , VERSION

DAMAGE_ID , SHOP_ID , MATERIEL_ID , date_format(DAMAGE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') DAMAGE_TIME , DESCRIPTION , IMG_FIRST_URL , IMG_SECOND_URL , IMG_THIRD_URL , REMARK , CREATE_BY , date_format(CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') CREATE_TIME , UPDATE_BY , date_format(UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') UPDATE_TIME , VERSION
mapper.select: SELECT c.COMPANY_NAME, d.DAMAGE_ID, d.DAMAGE_TIME, r.REGION_NAME AS COUNTRY_NAME, e.REGION_NAME AS CITY_NAME, s.SHOP_CODE, s.SHOP_NAME, d.CREATE_BY, m.EMP_NAME, t.DUTY_NAME, a.NAME_CN, a.NAME_EN, d.CREATE_TIME FROM T_SHOP_DAMAGE d LEFT JOIN T_SHOP s ON d.SHOP_ID = s.ID LEFT JOIN T_COMPANY c ON s.COMPANY_ID = c.ID LEFT JOIN T_REGION r ON s.COUNTRY = r.ID LEFT JOIN T_REGION e ON s.CITY = e.ID LEFT JOIN T_USER u ON d.CREATE_BY = u.USER_CODE LEFT JOIN T_EMPLOYEE m ON u.ID = m.U_ID LEFT JOIN T_DUTY t ON m.DUTY_ID = t.ID LEFT JOIN T_MATERIEL a ON d.MATERIEL_ID = a.ID WHERE 1=1
SELECT count(1) AS totalcount FROM T_SHOP_DAMAGE WHERE 1=1

SELECT s.SHOP_NAME, e.EMP_NAME, m.NAME_EN, m.NAME_CN, d.DAMAGE_TIME, d.DESCRIPTION, d.IMG_FIRST_URL, d.IMG_SECOND_URL, d.IMG_THIRD_URL FROM T_SHOP_DAMAGE d LEFT JOIN T_SHOP s ON d.SHOP_ID = s.ID LEFT JOIN T_USER u ON d.CREATE_BY = u.USER_CODE LEFT JOIN T_EMPLOYEE e ON u.ID = e.U_ID LEFT JOIN T_MATERIEL m ON d.MATERIEL_ID = m.ID WHERE d.DAMAGE_ID = #{damageId}
